subSections.title: Pronunciation 1
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=lā
|c=laai1,laap6
|h=pfs=lâ/lâi/lô
|mn=la/tw:lá/ml:la̍p
|mn_note=la - colloquial; lá - in certain compounds; la̍p - literary
|w=1'la,5laq
|ma=y
|mc=y
|oc=y
|cat=v,pn
}}

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{†}} to [[destroy]]; to [[break]]
# {{†}} to [[insult]]
# {{†}} to [[strike]]; to [[hit]]; to [[beat]]
# to [[pull]]; to [[drag]]; to [[tug]]
# to [[transport]] by [[vehicle]]; to [[haul]]; to [[carry]] on a vehicle
# to [[play]] (a bowed instrument, an accordion, etc.)
#: {{zh-x|拉 二胡|to '''play''' the erhu}}
# to [[drag out]]; to [[draw out]]
# {{lb|zh|Mainland}} to [[owe]]; to be in [[arrears]]
# to [[lead]] (a group to a place); to [[move]] (a group to a place)
# to [[help]]; to [[lend a hand|lend (a hand)]]
# to [[invite]]; to [[recruit]]
# to [[drag in]]; to [[implicate]]
# to [[draw in]]; to [[canvass]]; to [[solicit]]; to [[attract]]
# to [[organize]] (a group); to [[form]] (a group)
# {{lb|zh|Cantonese}} to [[arrest]]
# {{lb|zh|dialectal}} to [[bring up]]; to [[raise]]
# {{lb|zh|Mainland|colloquial}} to [[chat]]
# {{†}} {{lb|zh|onomatopoeia}} {{n-g|The sound of [[wind]].}}
# to [[excrete]]
# {{surname|lang=zh}}
